newTranche(uint64,bytes16,string,string,.details: In order to have the same address on different EVMs `salt` should be used         during creationg process.

params.name: Name of the new token.
params.poolId: Id of the pool. Id is one of the already supported pools.
params.trancheId: Id of the tranche. Id is one of the already supported tranches.
params.trancheWards: Address which can call methods behind authorized only.

deny(address).notice: Remove user as a ward (remove admin access)

newTranche(uint64,bytes16,string,string,.notice: Used to deploy new tranche tokens.

rely(address).notice: Make user a ward (give them admin access)

wards(address).notice: Returns whether the target is a ward (has admin access)
